channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Target’s beaten-down stock gets a lift after report of ‘significant investment’ from Toms Capital
item.description: As shoppers dealing with higher living costs continue to seek out bargains, Target has struggled to compete with Walmart.

item.title: ‘Is it a case of them or us?’ We’re in our 40s. Do we retire early in our 50s — or save for our kids’ education?
item.description: “We’re both teachers, with a combined gross income of $210,000.”

item.title: How the New Year’s tax deadline poses a risk for gold, silver and the Dow
item.description: The right time for investors to make a move may be sooner than they think.

item.title: Logan Paul’s $5.3 million Pokémon bet raises a bigger question: Do collectibles belong in your portfolio?
item.description: Collectibles may offer eye-catching returns, but not all financial experts are on board.

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: These are Raymond James' top stock picks for 2026
item.description: The investment firm added DoorDash and Shake Shack to its list of top stock picks for 2026, a recent note to clients shows.

item.title: There are two risks the market isn’t pricing in heading into the new year, according to Apollo’s Torsten Slok
item.description: Apollo chief economist Torsten Slok said that the Supreme Court potentially striking down President Trump's tariffs could be a big headline risk for m...

item.title: Here’s where you can still snag 4% yields on idle cash
item.description: As 2026 approaches, these rich yields may be too good to last.

item.title: These are UBS' top stock picks for 2026
item.description: UBS' "26 U.S. Stocks for 2026" list includes Amazon, UnitedHealth Group and PepsiCo, its recent note to clients shows.

item.title: Time to sell silver and buy gold, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the technicals between silver and gold.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
